name.content: name → str : Get or set the name of the file. This name can include slashes but should not include leading slashes.

size.content: size → int (Read Only): Get the size of the file data.

date.content: date → "datetime.datetime" (Read Only): Get the modified date of the file in the form of a datetime Python object.

virtualPath.content: virtualPath → str (Read Only): Get the virtual path of the file. Returns a String formatted for fetching the file data from VFS in operators such as the Movie File In TOP. Format is vfs:<path to owner>:<filename>.

originalFilePath.content: originalFilePath → str (Read Only): Get the original file path on disk. If the VFSFile was created from a bytearray and not a file on disk then this will be empty.

owner.content: owner → OP (Read Only): Get the OP owner.

byteArray.content: byteArray → bytearray : Get or set the file data as a bytearray.

destroy.content: destroy()→ None: Destroys the file in VFS referenced by this object.

export.content:
export(folder)→ str: Exports the file to the specified folder on disk and returns the location.
folder - The folder on disk to export the file to. TouchDesigner Build: Latest\nwikieditorwikieditor2021.10000before 2021.10000
